titleStmt.title: Health's new store-house opened offering to familiar use such supplies as are most wanting and really needful to humane frailty. By health's student.
titleStmt.author: Walwyn, William, 1600-1681.

titleStmt.title: Health's new store-house opened offering to familiar use such supplies as are most wanting and really needful to humane frailty. By health's student.
titleStmt.author: Walwyn, William, 1600-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Jane Clowes, and are to be sold by John Sweeting at the Angel in Popes-head-Alley over against the Royal Exchange in Corn-hill,

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed W.W. i.e. William Walwyn.
Identified on UMI microfilm set "Early English books, 1641-1700", reel 1878:3 as Wing W147 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
